column5: THESE !!  MH9BX - Portable Buddy heater 4000-9000 BTU    Best price I am seeing is $90 .... What's the best you guys have seen in and around TO ?
thats about the best price you will find. theres also the big buddy which puts out 4000-9000-18,000 bps $159.99
That's womens work and I don't see no panties on my a__.
LOL..   Time to buy shares in propane!!
Lowes in the States has'em on for $39.95...if you happen to live close to the border...
